note: I am a dedicated medical journalist with a focus on simplifying complex health topics for readers. Specialising in conditions like high blood pressure, infertility, erectile dysfunction, high cholesterol, and chlamydia, I provide clear and concise information on managing these issues. I also explore symptoms and treatments for conditions such as fibroids, endometriosis, monkeypox, menorrhagia, and low sperm count. To know more details about my project visit: https://md.co.uk/conditions
